<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 4"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Viking Weapon Familiarity](/Feats.aspx?ID=2096) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Archetype" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=12" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Advanced Player's Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=39) pg. 198 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

**Archetype** [Viking](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=81)

**Prerequisites**
[Viking Dedication](/Feats.aspx?ID=2094)

</column>

---

From childhood, you have been exposed to traditional viking weapons, and you soon learned to handle them in battle. Now, you can raid proudly alongside your fellows. You are trained with the [battle axe](/Weapons.aspx?ID=16), [hatchet](/Weapons.aspx?ID=27), [longsword](/Weapons.aspx?ID=31), and [shortsword](/Weapons.aspx?ID=43). In addition, you gain the [Shield Block](/Feats.aspx?ID=839) reaction.

<title level="2">Viking Weapon Familiarity leads to...</title>
[Viking Weapon Specialist](/Feats.aspx?ID=2097)
name: Viking Weapon Familiarity
